nodes.text: HoloNet News Special Report: Empire Ensures New Affordable Housing on Lothal
HoloNet News Special Report: Empire Ensures New Affordable Housing on Lothal is the sixth video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, Holonetnews.com. It was posted on September 12, 2014.

In an exclusive HoloNet report, the Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle announced that the Imperial Minister Maketh Tua had successfully negotiated a deal to bring new government-sponsored housing to Lothal. This new housing program was intended to encourage more people to move from family farms into planned urban communities. The new Imperial residential sector was marketed as efficient and affordable with the aim of ensuring stability for Lothal's growing population. Alton directed citizens to take their inquiries to their local Imperial housing office.
